Changelog
=========

1.2 (2010-02-04)
----------------

- Make ``five.megrok.layout`` work with Zope 2.12. If you whish to use
  a previous version of Zope 2, please use ``five.megrok.layout`` 1.1.

1.1 (2009-11-24)
----------------

- Add Zope 2 security grokkers for Page and Form.
- Add more tests.

1.0 (2009-09-17)
----------------

- Initial release
